title: Session 4: Deploying a Website
description: Learn the essentials of deploying a static website using modern tools like GitHub and Netlify. Go from local project to live on the web.

title: Session 3: Web Dev Basics
description: Your journey into web development starts here. We'll cover the foundational blocks: HTML for structure, CSS for style, and a touch of JavaScript for interactivity.

title: Build Your Portfolio!
description: A challenge featuring VSCode, Github, Netlify, Grok AI for building a online portfolio

title: First Online Session
description: Our first online session, also dubbed as Session Two. We covered club logistics and planned future activities in a virtual space.

title: First Session: The Genesis
description: Our inaugural in-person session where we introduced ULIC, its vision, and welcomed our founding members.

title: Season One: Origin
description: The first season of the ULIC Monthly Event. A series of challenges and workshops with prizes for the top 3 contestants.

title: UCA Unveiled
description: The official launch of ULIC under the UCA banner, a milestone event for our entire community, setting the stage for future innovation.
